title: Did Jordan Peterson Steal the Ideas of Viktor Frankl?
description:
I got done with Man's Search For Meaning by Viktor Frankl. I forgot to mention this in the video, but everyone should make an effort to read this book. I don't really talk about the book as such here because it's hard to put Frankl's ideas any better than he puts them. 

This video, therefore, is mostly on the connections between Viktor Frankl, Jordan Peterson, and Christianity. Not really sure where these ideas will take me, but it's interesting to ponder. 

This is episode 40 of my podcast.

Check out my podcast: 
Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/finding-ideas-colton-kirby/id1547093210?uo=4
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/2EaWRP21FTpnr9kZegkF1K
Podbean: https://www.podbean.com/podcast-detail/zpxi3-1900ec/Finding-Ideas-%7C-Colton-Kirby-Podcast
Google Podcasts: https://podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbmNob3IuZm0vcy80NmU1MzgwMC9wb2RjYXN0L3Jzcw==
Radio Public: https://radiopublic.com/finding-ideas-colton-kirby-GbMvlN
Pocket Casts: https://pca.st/9fy41bih
Breaker: https://www.breaker.audio/finding-ideas-the-colton-kirby-show

Some of my other stuff:
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
My Substack: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
